aboutMe: I have always been multifaceted and curious, perceptive and eager to take on new challenges. Over time, my profile has evolved into a well-rounded personality. My academic and professional background in the humanities has given me the ability to connect the IT world with the needs of the client. I aim to transform the abstract into something tangible, organized, and functional when I write code, but more importantly, even before I start coding.
capstone: School portal developed in ASP.NET as a final project at Epicode, enabling the management of enrollments, classes, and payments.
inForno: The application allows users to place orders and enables admins to manage received orders, available pizzas, and daily earnings.
vetClinic: Group project developed in ASP.NET for managing a veterinary clinic.
biblioTu: Group project developed in ASP.NET for managing an online library.
